document.title: The Sullivan Decision
document.abstract: Keynote Address, "Head Their Rising Voices: New York Times v. Sullivan-40 Years Later," The University of Tennessee College of Law, February 27, 2004. ** Mr. Lewis is a Pulitzer Prize.
document.publication-title: Tennessee Journal of Law and Policy

field.name: acknowledgements
field.value: Mr. Lewis is a Pulitzer Prize winning author and columnist. He reported on the Sullivan case for The New York Times and later wrote MAKE No LAW: THE SULLIVAN CASE AND THE FIRST AMENDMENT (1991), which Judge Alex Kozinski called a "tour de force" that "no responsible journalist will be without." 124 Otis Stephens is the Alumni Distinguished Service Professor of Political Science and Resident Scholar of Constitutional Law at the University of Tennessee College of Law. Professor Stephens is also a Faculty Advisor to this publication. 125 376 U.S. 254 (1964).
